summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Land Use and Zoning; amending Plat 37W, Page 104 of the Official Zoning Map of the City of Seattle, (Ordinance 86300) to rezone certain property in Blocks 22 and 23, Capitol Hill Addition to the City of Seattle, (Division No. 2); Block 46, Capitol Hill Addition to the City of Seattle, Division No. 6; Blocks 4, 13 and 20, Law's Addition to Seattle; Blocks 1 and 4, Marvin's Capitol Hill certain Lots in the Longfellow Addition to the City of Seattle, from Community Business (BC) Zone to Intermediate Business (B1) Zone (Stevens Neighborhood, Area 6).
